possible_conditions.name: Digestive Disturbance (Agnimandya)
possible_conditions.description: Weak digestive fire leading to incomplete digestion and gas formation
possible_conditions.ayurvedic_perspective: Weakened Agni (digestive fire) with Vata causing gas and irregular function, Pitta causing acidity

immediate_actions: Sip warm ginger tea after meals
recommendations.when_to_consult_doctor: If pain is severe, persistent, or accompanied by vomiting, blood in stool, or significant weight loss

dosha_imbalance.description: Weakened Agni (digestive fire) with Vata causing gas and irregular function, Pitta causing acidity
